function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate space allocation for students and vehicles leading to overcrowding and congestion.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to close proximity and limited space for physical distancing.","Mitigation":"Allocate additional space for students and vehicles to reduce congestion and allow for adequate physical distancing measures.","Technologies":"Utilize smart parking systems to optimize vehicle allocation and reduce congestion. Implement building control systems to monitor and enforce physical distancing measures.","People":"Students, faculty, and visitors are at risk of exposure to contagion. Traffic management and facility management teams can implement the mitigation measures.","Owner":"Building management, educational institution administration, and facility management teams can take the lead in implementing the mitigation measures."}]}
